description:
The Natsume family heads to the beach to investigate a underwater Mishima base. Kyusaku gets captured while sneaking into the base, but Nuku Nuku can`t swim! This time it`s her classmates who come to the rescue. Can they defeat the Speedy Girls and their supernatural powers?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku Manatsu no Battle! ESPer Shoujo-tai no Wana!
Nuku Nuku summer`s battle - A trap by esper girls
ヌクヌク真夏のバトル! エスパー少女隊の罠!
